an8.65:1.1: “Mendicants, there are these eight dimensions of mastery.
an8.65:1.3: Perceiving form internally, someone sees visions externally, limited, both pretty and ugly.
an8.65:1.4: Mastering them, they perceive: ‘I know and see.’
an8.65:1.5: This is the first dimension of mastery.
an8.65:2.1: Perceiving form internally, someone sees visions externally, limitless, both pretty and ugly.
an8.65:2.2: Mastering them, they perceive: ‘I know and see.’
an8.65:2.3: This is the second dimension of mastery.
an8.65:3.1: Not perceiving form internally, someone sees visions externally, limited, both pretty and ugly.
an8.65:3.2: Mastering them, they perceive: ‘I know and see.’
an8.65:3.3: This is the third dimension of mastery.
an8.65:4.1: Not perceiving form internally, someone sees visions externally, limitless, both pretty and ugly.
an8.65:4.2: Mastering them, they perceive: ‘I know and see.’
an8.65:4.3: This is the fourth dimension of mastery.
an8.65:5.1: Not perceiving form internally, someone sees visions externally, blue, with blue color, blue hue, and blue tint.
an8.65:5.2: Mastering them, they perceive: ‘I know and see.’
an8.65:5.3: This is the fifth dimension of mastery.
an8.65:6.1: Not perceiving form internally, someone sees visions externally, yellow, with yellow color, yellow hue, and yellow tint.
an8.65:6.2: Mastering them, they perceive: ‘I know and see.’
an8.65:6.3: This is the sixth dimension of mastery.
an8.65:7.1: Not perceiving form internally, someone sees visions externally, red, with red color, red hue, and red tint.
an8.65:7.2: Mastering them, they perceive: ‘I know and see.’
an8.65:7.3: This is the seventh dimension of mastery.
an8.65:8.1: Not perceiving form internally, someone sees visions externally, white, with white color, white hue, and white tint.
an8.65:8.2: Mastering them, they perceive: ‘I know and see.’
an8.65:8.3: This is the eighth dimension of mastery.
an8.65:8.4: These are the eight dimensions of mastery.”
